detaileddescription.para: Next hop group is ECMP, with a dynamic number of members, unordered

simplesect.title: Ignored:\n @@ignore - for backward compatibility

detaileddescription.para: Next hop group is ECMP, with a dynamic number of members, sorted by priority
Next hop group is ECMP, with a fixed, usually large, number of members, sorted by index
Next hop protection group. Contains primary and backup next hops.
Next hop group is class-based, with members selected by Forwarding class
Next hop group member is primary
Next hop group member is standby

briefdescription.para: Next hop group member configured protection role.

detaileddescription.para: Next hop group member is active
Next hop group member is inactive

briefdescription.para: Next hop group member observed role.
Number of next hops in the group.

simplesect.title: Value Type:\n @@type sai_uint32_t @par Flags:\n @@flags READ_ONLY

Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_list_t @par Flags:
 @@flags READ_ONLY @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_MEMBER
Value Type:\n @@type sai_next_hop_group_type_t @par Flags:\n @@flags MANDATORY_ON_CREATE | CREATE_ONLY @isresourcetype true

briefdescription.para: Trigger a switch-over from primary to backup next hop.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type bool @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default false @par Valid only when:
 @@validonly SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_PROTECTION

detaileddescription.para: When it is empty, then packet hits won't be counted

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_id_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_COUNTER @par Allows NULL object ID
 @@allownull true @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID

detaileddescription.para: Maximum desired number of members. The real size should be queried from SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_REAL_SIZE

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint32_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_ONLY @par Default value:
 @@default 0 @par Valid only when:
 @@validonly SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_FINE_GRAIN_ECMP or SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_CLASS_BASED @isresourcetype true

detaileddescription.para: Can be different (greater or equal) from the configured size. Application must use this value to know the exact size of the group. Should be used with SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_FINE_GRAIN_ECMP.

simplesect.title: Value Type:\n @@type sai_uint32_t @par Flags:\n @@flags READ_ONLY

Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_id_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_MAP @par Allows NULL object ID
 @@allownull true @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID @par Valid only when:
 @@validonly SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_CLASS_BASED

briefdescription.para: Hierarchical next hop group level. true: Nexthop group consists of tunnel and IP nexthop false: Nexthop group consists of IP nexthop only.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type bool @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_ONLY @par Default value:
 @@default true @par Valid only when:
 @@validonly SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_DYNAMIC_UNORDERED_ECMP or SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_DYNAMIC_ORDERED_ECMP @isresourcetype true

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_id_t @par Flags:
 @@flags MANDATORY_ON_CREATE | CREATE_ONLY @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_NEXT_HOP_GROUP

Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_id_t @par Flags:
 @@flags MANDATORY_ON_CREATE | CREATE_AND_SET @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_NEXT_HOP, SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_NEXT_HOP_GROUP

detaileddescription.para: Should only be used if the type of owning group is SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_DYNAMIC_ORDERED_ECMP or SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_DYNAMIC_UNORDERED_ECMP

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint32_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default 1

briefdescription.para: Configured role in the protection group.

detaileddescription.para: Should only be used if the type of owning group is SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_PROTECTION

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_next_hop_group_member_configured_role_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_ONLY @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_MEMBER_CONFIGURED_ROLE_PRIMARY

briefdescription.para: The actual role in protection group.

detaileddescription.para: Should only be used if the type of owning group is SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_PROTECTION

simplesect.title: Value Type:\n @@type sai_next_hop_group_member_observed_role_t @par Flags:\n @@flags READ_ONLY

briefdescription.para: The object to be monitored for this next hop.

detaileddescription.para: If the specified objects fails, the switching entity marks this next hop as SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_MEMBER_PROTECTION_ROLE_FAILED and does not use it to forward traffic. If there is a backup next hop available in this group then the backup's observed role is set to SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_MEMBER_PROTECTION_ROLE_FORWARDING and it is used to forward traffic.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_id_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT, SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_LAG, SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_ROUTER_INTERFACE, SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_VLAN_MEMBER, SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_TUNNEL, SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_BRIDGE_PORT @par Allows NULL object ID
 @@allownull true @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID

briefdescription.para: Object index in the fine grain ECMP table.

detaileddescription.para: Index specifying the strict member's order. Allowed value range for is from 0 to SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_ATTR_REAL_SIZE - 1. Should only be used if the type of owning group is SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_FINE_GRAIN_ECMP or SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_CLASS_BASED.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint32_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_ONLY @par Default value:
 @@default 0

briefdescription.para: Object's sequence ID for enforcing the members' order.

detaileddescription.para: Loose index specifying the member's order. The index is not strict allowing for the missing IDs in a sequence. It's driver's job to translate the sequence IDs to the real indexes in the group. Should only be used if the type of owning group is SAI_NEXT_HOP_GROUP_TYPE_DYNAMIC_ORDERED_ECMP.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_uint32_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default 0

detaileddescription.para: When it is empty, then packet hits won't be counted

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_object_id_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Allowed object types
 @@objects SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_COUNTER @par Allows NULL object ID
 @@allownull true @par Default value:
 @@default SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base
Next hop group map forwarding-class to index

briefdescription.para: Next hop group entries associated with this map.

simplesect.title:
Value Type:
 @@type sai_map_list_t @par Flags:
 @@flags CREATE_AND_SET @par Default value:
 @@default empty

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base

briefdescription.para: Next hop group member configured protection role.
